trans-unit.source: Using the Wait Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Using the Wait Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to create and configure the Wait Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to create and configure the Wait Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Wait connector enables an app to delay its execution for a specified duration or until the occurrence of a specified time.
trans-unit.target: Wait connector enables an app to delay its execution for a specified duration or until the occurrence of a specified time.

trans-unit.source: You can add the Wait Connector to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: You can add the Wait Connector to your business workflow and process data as part of this workflow within a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: When used in a Logic App, it can be used to delay execution.
trans-unit.target: When used in a Logic App, it can be used to delay execution.

trans-unit.source: To use the Wait connector, you need to first create an instance of the Wait Connector API app.
trans-unit.target: To use the Wait connector, you need to first create an instance of the Wait Connector API app.

trans-unit.source: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the Wait Connector API app from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the Wait Connector API app from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Wait Connector can be used as an action.
trans-unit.target: Wait Connector can be used as an action.

trans-unit.source: It does not have any triggers.
trans-unit.target: It does not have any triggers.

trans-unit.source: Click on Wait Connector from the right pane: <linkText>List of Actions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: Click on Wait Connector from the right pane: <linkText>List of Actions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Wait Connector supports two actions:
trans-unit.target: Wait Connector supports two actions:

trans-unit.source: Delay
trans-unit.target: Delay

trans-unit.source: Delay Until
trans-unit.target: Delay Until

trans-unit.source: Select Delay: Delay input
trans-unit.target: Select Delay: Delay input

trans-unit.source: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it: <linkText>Action configured</linkText>
trans-unit.target: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it: <linkText>Action configured</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Description of the parameter
trans-unit.target: Description of the parameter

trans-unit.source: Duration In Minutes
trans-unit.target: Duration In Minutes

trans-unit.source: integer
trans-unit.target: integer

trans-unit.source: Delay duration in minutes
trans-unit.target: Delay duration in minutes

trans-unit.source: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>What are Logic Apps?</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>What are Logic Apps?</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: View the Swagger REST API reference at <linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: View the Swagger REST API reference at <linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.
trans-unit.target: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title>.
